__e: Hey, who is this skunk with the love and the flowers?
The only thing wrong with you is your husband is a jerk.
Even including the fact that you're an officer. And... . And I just can't go on being such a heel as to let you think I thought of giving you those.
I think you're a big, yellow louse!
Yes, I am a bastard and you'll never go to bed with me again
There's this one guy calling another guy a shitheel.
It's going a bit far to call that skunk a friend of mine.
And that ignorant quack of a cheap hotel doctor... All he knew was I was in pain.
What about the butts and he being here?
One is a scoundrel whom you leave behind the door, while the other is going out in the street.
Now call your father and tell the dirt bag he can come.
Excuse my expression, but you think I'm a real asshole.
If that traitor doesn't want me, he doesn't deserve me.
I got only one word to say to you, you beast. Don't do it.
